mongo-replace-error: There was an error while updating content in the database.
mongo-add-update-error: There was an error while adding or updating content in the database.
missing-write-permission: You do not have permission to change this content object.
missing-delete-permission: You do not have permission to delete this content object.
missing-view-permission: You do not have permission to view this content object.
missing-list-content-permission: You do not have permission to list content objects.
s3-upload-error: There was an error while uploading the file {{filename}} to storage.
deleting-content-error: There was an error while deleting the content object.
deleting-file-error: There was an error while the file {{filename}} from the content object.
content-not-found: The content you're trying to access does not exist.
listing-content-error: There was an error while getting the list of content objects
